entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@SpeakerPelosi @SenSchumer Nancy, you need to free Tony Fauci to tell the US Public the truth about Coronavirus.  Trump doesn’t want people to know the truth.  
There are people in Japan and China that are getting sick AGAIN, AFTER recovering from Coronavirus already.  There is not enough truth out there.
